name: Pigeons Never Die v2
description:
Telephones lines rise and fall but pigeons never die. Become a postmaster in the Columbidae army and send out pigeons with supplies to keep morale high. Keep the troops motivated until the war is won! 

MUST BE PLAYED IN FULLSCREEN 

Credits: 

Steven Seung - Game Design and Programming

Tom Tan - Game Designer and Programmer

Brooke Yap - Music and Sound Design

Nicholas Dobkin - Art

Stewart Smith - Game Design and Programming

Max Wike - Music and Sound Design

Christian Gayle - Lore + Writing

Daniel Son - Programming
